column1: Percentage change, latest quarter (2020 Q2) compared with:
1 Figures from 2011 Q2 onwards based on the date the bankruptcy order was granted by the court or the Adjudicator.
2 From October 2015, the minimum debt required to initiate a creditor petition bankruptcy increased from £750 to £5,000.
3 From 6 April 2016, the process for people making themselves bankrupt moved online and out of the courts.
